Protocols/VideoControlViewDelegate.html#.name: toggleLocalAudio()
Protocols/VideoControlViewDelegate.html#.abstract: Handler for the mute button being pressed. Mutes or unmutes the local audio.

Protocols/VideoControlViewDelegate.html#.name: toggleLocalVideo()
Protocols/VideoControlViewDelegate.html#.abstract: Handler for the toggle video button being pressed. Mutes or unmutes the local video.

Protocols/VideoControlViewDelegate.html#.name: leaveCall()
Protocols/VideoControlViewDelegate.html#.abstract: Handler for the hang up button being pressed. Leaves the video channel and dismisses the view controller.

Protocols/VideoControlViewDelegate.html#.name: switchCamera()
Protocols/VideoControlViewDelegate.html#.abstract: Handler for the switch camera button being pressed. Toggles between the front and back cameras.

Protocols/VideoControlViewDelegate.html.name: VideoControlViewDelegate
Protocols/VideoControlViewDelegate.html.abstract: Protocol for handling button presses in the video control panel that need to trigger Agora functionality.

Functions.html#/s:10AgoraUIKit6lprintyyS.name: lprint(_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:10AgoraUIKit6lprintyyS.abstract: A simple method to accepts a log message and the verbosity level at which to print it.

Enums/LogLevel.html.name: LogLevel
Enums/LogLevel.html.abstract: An enum to represent the avialable levels of verbosity for logging.

Global%20Variables.html#/s:10AgoraUIKit8.name: logLevel
Global%20Variables.html#/s:10AgoraUIKit8.abstract: The verbosity setting for the amount of logs to display.

Classes/VideoControlView.html#/s:10Agora.name: delegate
Classes/VideoControlView.html#/s:10Agora.abstract: Delegate to handle actual functionality. Notified when buttons are pressed.

Classes/VideoControlView.html#/s:10Agora.name: setupControls(hideMute:hideVideo:hideSwitchCamera:)
Classes/VideoControlView.html#/s:10Agora.abstract: Shows or hides the desired non-essential buttons. Defaults to showing all buttons.

Classes/VideoControlView.html#/c:@M@Agor.name: didToggleMute(_:)
Classes/VideoControlView.html#/c:@M@Agor.abstract: Handler for the mute button being pressed.

Classes/VideoControlView.html#/c:@M@Agor.name: didToggleVideo(_:)
Classes/VideoControlView.html#/c:@M@Agor.abstract: Handler for the toggle video button being pressed.

Classes/VideoControlView.html#/c:@M@Agor.name: didTapHangUp(_:)
Classes/VideoControlView.html#/c:@M@Agor.abstract: Handler for the hang up button being pressed.

Classes/VideoControlView.html#/c:@M@Agor.name: didSwitchCamera(_:)
Classes/VideoControlView.html#/c:@M@Agor.abstract: Handler for the switch camera button being pressed.

Classes/ToggleButton.html#/c:@M@AgoraUIK.name: offImage
Classes/ToggleButton.html#/c:@M@AgoraUIK.abstract: The image that will be shown when the button is toggled off.

Classes/ToggleButton.html#/c:@M@AgoraUIK.name: offSelectedImage
Classes/ToggleButton.html#/c:@M@AgoraUIK.abstract: The image that will be shown when the button is selected while off.

Classes/ToggleButton.html#/c:@M@AgoraUIK.name: onImage
Classes/ToggleButton.html#/c:@M@AgoraUIK.abstract: The image that will be shown when the button is toggled on.

Classes/ToggleButton.html#/c:@M@AgoraUIK.name: onSelectedImage
Classes/ToggleButton.html#/c:@M@AgoraUIK.abstract: The image that will be shown when the button is selected while on.

Classes/ToggleButton.html#/s:10AgoraUIKi.name: setToggled(on:)
Classes/ToggleButton.html#/s:10AgoraUIKi.abstract: Toggle the button state to the given boolean.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: videoRenderMode
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: The render mode of the video views. Defaults to RenderModeHidden.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController/VideoCo.name: VideoControlLocation
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController/VideoCo.abstract: Available locations for the video control panel.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: controlLocation
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: Location of the video controls, either top or bottom.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: controlOffset
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: How far from the edge of the screen to place the video controls. Minimum of 0. Defaults to 20.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: init(channel:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: Convenience initializer. Uses the existing appID and token in AgoraPreferences.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: init(coder:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Required init. Not implemented.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: setParameters(appID:token:channel:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: Sets the core parameters for a new AgoraVideoViewController. Redundant with init(appID:, token:, channel:).

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: addControlView()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: Adds the control view created by loadControlView(). Call this function if you are using your own layout, but want to use the default control view.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: loadControlView()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: Loads the video control view. Override to create your own video controls.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Initializes and joins an Agora channel on first load.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: viewWillAppear(_:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: toggleLocalAudio()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: Mutes or unmutes the local audio. Called when the mute button is pressed.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: toggleLocalVideo()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: Mutes or unmutes the local video. Called when the disable video button is pressed.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: leaveCall()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: Leaves the video channel and dismisses the view controller. Called when the hang up button is pressed.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: switchCamera()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: Toggles between the front and back cameras. Called when the switch camera button is pressed.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: setIsAudience()
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: Makes the local user an audience member, with no local video or audio. Automatically sets the channel profile to .liveBroadcasting.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: setMaxStreams(streams:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: Sets the maximum number of video streams to show at once, including the local stream.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: hideSwitchCamera(hidden:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: Toggles whether to hide the button to switch cameras.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: hideVideoMute(hidden:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: Toggles whether to hide the button to mute the local video feed.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.name: hideAudioMute(hidden:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/s.abstract: Toggles whether to hide the button to mute the local audio feed.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:numberOfItemsInSection:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Handles showing the correct number of video streams. Default behavior displays up to four video streams at a time.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:cellForItemAt:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Handles the layout and setup of cells for displaying users’ video streams.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: collectionView(_:layout:sizeForItemAt:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Determines the size of each collection view cell.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:didOccurWarning:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Reports a warning during the Agora SDK at runtime.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:didOccurError:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Reports an error during the Agora SDK at runtime.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:didApiCallExecute:api:result:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when a method is executed by the SDK.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:didJoinChannel:withUid:elapsed:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the local user joins a specified channel.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:didRejoinChannel:withUid:elapsed:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the local user rejoins a channel.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:didLeaveChannelWith:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the local user leaves a channel.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:didRegisteredLocalUser:withUid:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the local user successfully registers a user account by calling the registerLocalUserAccount or joinChannelByUserAccount method.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:didJoinedOfUid:elapsed:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when a remote user or host joins a channel.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:didUpdatedUserInfo:withUid:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the SDK gets the user ID and user account of the remote user.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:didOfflineOfUid:reason:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when a remote user (Communication)/host (Live Broadcast) leaves a channel. Same as userOfflineBlock.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:connectionChangedTo:reason:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the network connection state changes.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:networkTypeChangedTo:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the local network type changes.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngineConnectionDidLost(_:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the SDK cannot reconnect to Agora’s edge server 10 seconds after its connection to the server is interrupted.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:tokenPrivilegeWillExpire:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the token expires in 30 seconds.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngineRequestToken(_:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the token expires.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:reportAudioVolumeIndicationOfSpeakers:totalVolume:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Reports which users are speaking, the speakers’ volumes, and whether the local user is speaking.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:didAudioMuted:byUid:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when a remote user’s audio stream is muted/unmuted.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:activeSpeaker:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Reports which user is the loudest speaker over a period of time.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:firstLocalAudioFrame:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the engine sends the first local audio frame.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:firstRemoteAudioFrameOfUid:elapsed:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the engine receives the first audio frame from a specified remote user.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:didVideoMuted:byUid:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when a remote user’s video stream playback pauses/resumes.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:remoteVideoStateChangedOfUid:state:reason:elapsed:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the remote video state changes.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:receiveStreamMessageFromUid:streamId:data:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the local user receives the data stream from a remote user within five seconds.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.name: rtcEngine(_:didOccurStreamMessageErrorFromUid:streamId:error:missed:cached:)
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html#/c.abstract: Occurs when the local user does not receive the data stream from the remote user within five seconds.

Classes/AgoraPreferences.html#/s:10Agora.name: shared
Classes/AgoraPreferences.html#/s:10Agora.abstract: Static preferences singleton. Used to get and set preferences for Agora.

Classes/AgoraPreferences.html#/s:10Agora.name: appID
Classes/AgoraPreferences.html#/s:10Agora.abstract: Your Agora app ID. Can be acquired from console.agora.io.

Classes/AgoraPreferences.html#/s:10Agora.name: token
Classes/AgoraPreferences.html#/s:10Agora.abstract: Your authentication token. Can be nil for projects created without token authorization.

Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html.name: AgoraVideoViewController
Classes/AgoraVideoViewController.html.abstract: AgoraVideoViewController is a view controller capable of joining and managing a multi-party Agora video call. It handles joining and leaving a channel, as well as showing remote video feeds from other users in the call.

Classes/VideoControlView.html.name: VideoControlView
Classes/VideoControlView.html.abstract: VideoControlView is a container for a set of buttons to control the functionality of the video call. By default, contains buttons to toggle the audio and video, switch camera, and hang up. Use loadControlView() in AgoraVideoViewController to add customizations.

Global%20Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global%20Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
